title: Ahab’s Victories Over Syria
summary: King Ben-Hadad of Syria attacks Israel. Despite Ahab’s sin, God grants Israel victory twice to show His power. Ahab spares Ben-Hadad, which displeases God, and a prophet delivers a message of judgment.

faq.question: Who attacked Israel in this chapter?
Why was Ahab rebuked by a prophet?
faq.answer: Because he spared Ben-Hadad when God had appointed him for destruction.
